trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示一套<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods enable you to add and remove individual controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法使你能够添加和从集合中删除单独的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> methods to add or remove all the controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A>方法来添加或从集合中移除所有控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is a member of the collection by passing the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>是通过将传递到该控件的集合的成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Contains%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: To get the index value of the location of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> in the collection, pass the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的位置的索引值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>在集合中，将传递到该控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOf%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: The collection can be copied into an array by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 集合可以通过调用复制到数组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>具有指定名称。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定的项。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>从删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>，所有后续的控件将上移集合中的一个位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method, or remove all controls by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法或移除所有控件通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>的对象添加到集合中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>要从此<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"> </xref>是只读的。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A> method, or remove all controls by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> method.
